session.speaker: Thomas Haver
session.bio: Thomas is presently serving as a Test Automation Architect. He leads a team of testers, ops engineers, and production support analysts in the adoption of DevOps practices. Previously, he led the enterprise automation support of 73 applications at Huntington National Bank that encompassed testing, metrics & reporting, and data management.
session.title: From Novice to Expert: How M&T Bank Supercharged Their Mobile Testing
session.abstract:
M&T Bank, one of the largest banks in the Eastern US, needed a better way to test their mobile banking app and ensure their UX was on point. By turning to the power of Perfecto, they saw immediate positive results with:
- Combining manual and automated testing for effective tests against real devices.
- Speeding up their testing velocity by testing on real and virtual devices.
- Streamlining their testing processes across their entire team by leveraging Perfecto Scriptless' simple and fast test creation capabilities. 

This session will cover how M&T Bank's team was able to use those tools to test end-user combinations in order to align the test coverage with the userbase. Hear how their teamâ€™s revamped mobile testing program helped recreate defects that would otherwise be impossible on corporate machines.
